name: C300_Labour_Parameter_IM
description:
CXCPQ-43534
when im = "Non-Standard Build" then use below
 if io<= 400, Base = 16
 else if  io> 400 and io<=2000, Base = 32
Else if io>2000 and io<= 5000, Base = 64
Else io> 5000, Base = 128

when im = "Standard Build" then use below
 if io<= 400, Base = 8
 else if  io> 400 and io<=2000, Base = 16
Else if io>2000 and io<= 5000, Base = 32
Else io> 5000, Base = 64
